attributes.action: have Internet Explorer destroyed for crimes against web sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For far too long, we the web developers of this world who strive to keep web standards and internet compliancy alive have had to resort to time consuming alterations in Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) code in order to get out websites to look the same in Internet Explorer as in other browsers. Things that Internet Explorer won't recognise will be recognised in other browsers such as Firefox ond Opera, this practice must stop and the only way it have Internet Explorer destroyed - period. With your signature we can stop this terror from consuming as all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
